Package shared.functions

Interface Functions

All Known Implementing Classes:
DatabaseProvider, Game, Game, Player
public interface Functions
Functions interface Basic functions of conversion and calculation.

  • Method Details

    • toHash

      static byte[] toHash​(java.lang.String str)
      Function that returns the hash of the given secret.
      Parameters:
      str - the given String.
      Returns:
      the hash value of the secret.

    • proofHash

      static boolean proofHash​(java.lang.String string, byte[] hash)
      Function to check if the hash of given secret is coincident to the given hash.
      Parameters:
      string - the given secret in String.
      hash - the given hash in array.
      Returns:
      true as they are coincident, false adversely.

    • isEven

      static boolean isEven​(java.lang.String s1, java.lang.String s2)
      Function to check the parity of two numbers.
      Parameters:
      s1 - first number in String.
      s2 - second number in String.
      Returns:
      the parity of given numbers, true as even, false as odd.

    • byteToHex

      static java.lang.String byteToHex​(byte num)
      Function that convert byte to hexadecimal representation.
      Parameters:
      num - the byte value.
      Returns:
      the hexadecimal value.

    • encodeHexString

      static java.lang.String encodeHexString​(byte[] byteArray)
      Function that encode array of byte to hexadecimal representation.
      Parameters:
      byteArray - array of byte values.
      Returns:
      array of hexadecimal values.
